backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control, allowing authorized users to save and query profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the app title and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with view mode switching, print view handling, and shared layout elements like header and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Notice bar displaying a guidance message with a copy-URL button and status feedback.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: Daily Totals page showing selectable days, total revenue, and per-item quantities in a formatted UI.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Hook that loads available days, computes daily totals from summaries, and aggregates item quantities for selected days.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: Provides localStorage-based ledger and daily summary utilities for saving bill totals and computing daily revenue.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines the CatalogItem type and a predefined list of menu items with prices and categories.
Provides currency and numeric formatting helpers using Indian locale rules.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Implements matching logic between catalog items and line items, including normalization and quantity aggregation.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: React component for displaying, filtering, grouping, and managing predefined catalog items, including adding custom items and handling images.
Defines props for the PredefinedItemCatalog component, including callbacks for item actions and image updates.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: Renders a print-friendly bill view with line items, totals, and receipt formatting.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Handles saving, loading, retrieving, and clearing bill records in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page managing line items, catalog actions, totals, printing, and saving bills to storage and ledger.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: Defines core types for line items, calculator state, and calculation breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Provides numeric parsing, clamping, and functions to compute line totals, subtotals, and full tax/discount breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Reads an image File into a data URL using FileReader with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Loads a saved bill, triggers printing, handles print completion, and displays loading, error, or completion states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: Provides a hook to copy the current page URL using the clipboard API with fallbacks and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode values, and print-specific stylesheet rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Shows a confirmation dialog for deletions and returns the user’s choice.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with class-based dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, radius presets, and animation/typography/container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the app’s project state, goals, features, and architecture notes for a billing app with catalog, print flow, and daily totals tracking.
